website_summaries.verdict: This blender is great for vegetables, and its thick plastic bowl keeps eye-irritating onion fumes contained.
pros: Chops, dices, minces, blends, and works as an egg separator
Chopper with 3 sharp stainless steel blades
Egg separator and whipping arms included
cons: Do not put in the dishwasher
Be sure not to let the blades sit in water

customer_reviews.title: Returning it!!! My finger was cut by ...
customer_reviews.text: Returning it!!! My finger was cut by unprotected razor sharp as I removed parts from box. Too many parts . Instructions were in an Asian language... none in English.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBe

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix.
customer_reviews.text: This was very awful. I had a few Oreo cookies that I tried to chop up in this Manuel food processor. It will not chop it up, so i try to chop it up some more and putting it back in the food processor...... No it just would not turn. So I chopped it up two more pieces and put it back in there which I Shouldn't have to do.I did and try to spend turn it. It barely turn. The commercial that came with this product is a false because this was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mishielle

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, falls apart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept but its VERY cheaply made. I used it for the first time today just to dice up salad stuff and it falls apart under just normal use. The handle falls off very easily and there is nothing to hold it to the counter so you habe to hold it still but then it falls apart. I used to have a similar one but it was well made and never fell apart. Freaking China....I should have known.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with this chopper. It does a fantastic job for all my cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the seller so mean
customer_reviews.text: This is someone that has been returned after it has used. It has not been cleaned, and the knife is rusted, which is disgusting. the seller so mean. sent it without the wrap, so so disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: airjennifer

customer_reviews.title: This was a replacement of a similar item in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I had a hand crank plastic vegetable cutter for years and loved it. It started to get rust on the blades and I decided I wanted to get a new one. The new one will definitely do the job but, its fatter in circumference so it doesn't fit in my cupboard I kept the other one. (I know my problem) The booklet did not describe the egg separator function or the other paddle? I'm still glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I bought it because I make muffins and I need to cut up strawberries and cutting them manually takes me like an hr and with this product it took me like 10 seconds! You have to be careful when cleaning the blade because it's sharp. I wash it right away and dry it so I can put it away since my son grabs dishes from the clean rack to prevent any accidents. so far I have used it to cut walnuts and strawberries and I feel this cutter did a good job. I'm excited to use it for other things as I'm sure it'll cut down on the prep time.
customer_reviews.author: Iledesma

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. The screws that hold the top lid together have rusted after a few short uses. The bottom container has a white plastic ring to prevent slippage and that has a gap and has gathered enough moisture locked in to create mold. The lid is also hollow therefore water gathers if you soak it or wash it. Health hazard
customer_reviews.author: Purple Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Chopper
customer_reviews.text: It works but is poorly made. The actual function does work but the parts are flimsy and don’t fit well. The handle falls off and I have dropped the whole thing several times because the handle just came off. When using with liquid in it, the liquid pours out the poorly designed spout and onto the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Even my almost legally blind father in law uses with ease
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my father in law who lives with us he use to use this thing push on the top an it chops but it was small an he would constantly over fill if my father in law is also almost legally blind. So he is able to use this with ease no more over filling an no more hammering noises coming from the table.
customer_reviews.author: achelseab

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for me, the price was very good and i made my first salsa. Cleanup was a snap. today i'm going to put it through its batter stirring paces but it's already my favorite addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of junk. I used it several times and it does not chop up the onions properly. Ordered a differently designed product from same selection of products and it works well so far. Reviewed product was thrown into the garbage..
customer_reviews.author: D. Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Top spining handle designed poorly, weak and does not provide a secure spin.
customer_reviews.text: While very pleased with ease if clean.. turning Handle is poorly designed,.. does not spin securely.... Set too high. Have to literally hold entire top of handle to get a secure spin. Have had others where this was designed lower and never had a problem.. this one feels like it will eventually break from day 1. Will look for better designed model when this one breaks vs choose to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fischbeck

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful kitchen tool , I used to chopper dumpling contents ! It is doing good job
customer_reviews.author: Diane young

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After about a week, the metal in the attachment started to rust! The suction is not strong and does not work so I have to hold it while trying to crank the processor. Overall not a great food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day to prep my dishes. It’s very handy, you can control how big or how little you want the mince. Only con is it does not slice.
customer_reviews.author: BrinaBaby

customer_reviews.title: No more chopping onions, etc by hand.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chopper. The egg separator is a great added feature. My 14 year old grandson loves to use the chopper for chopping vegetables. He chopped up onion, bell pepper, celery and pickles for me to use in my potato salad and baked beans. He's amazed about the fact that the longer you wind the handle -- the finer your vegetables are chopped up. We love it, love it, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great!
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Spacious Good blades Cons- Very loose handles Hard to turn if you have a lot of vegetables inside
customer_reviews.author: Bijay

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This little chopper diced up olives and shredded carrots with little effort. Passes the test for me. I'm impressed. And surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Mani Miller

customer_reviews.title: best money ever spend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this product i love it is so easy to clean and it definitely gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: eridania

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money easy to cut vegetables
customer_reviews.text: This is very useful for day today cooking to cut vegetable. Very easy to chop spinach, beet root, onion, cabbage, carrot and prepare guocomale. However, green chillies are not grinding properly. So it's good for preparing most of the vegetables. I have already bought few more pieces and gave as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sudharsan M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice and sharp. Cleans up easy. Requires no batteries or electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N. Kosich

customer_reviews.title: So easy and works great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and so quick and East! Makes perfect fresh salsa!!!

customer_reviews.title: Not food grade safe
customer_reviews.text: This item contained screws that rusted. This is not food grade safe.

customer_reviews.title: Full stars
customer_reviews.text: I used for more than two years and it’s still working very good
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Handy kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I want it to do for small chopping and mixing jobs in the kitchen. I was truly amazed how well it worked. Easier than taking out my heavy big machine for the smaller jobs in the kitchen. Plus all attachments and handle fit in the bowl for storage too!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Does't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chopper because the large Brieftons 4 cup chopper was no longer available. Second time used I was trying to cut veggies for salad which included tiny carrots and the handle broke clear off the chopper. Would not order again. Of course the return date had expired.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha J Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace on that I have had for well over 10 years. This one is just as good! Very sturdy and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, cheap... one blade cheap plastic and just a horrible product

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love that I don't have to drag out my big bulky food processor to chop a few nuts or onions. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Useful and handy
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and wash. I like using specially when making my salad, but spilling on the lid when use with liquid plus the base slips as you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rico Campos

customer_reviews.title: This thing shreds
customer_reviews.text: Be careful not to over-chop your onions and such. You can go from diced to minced with just 2 more turns of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great little item for the price. We use it to make salsa and cole slaw from scratch. The blades are very sharp and cut well.

customer_reviews.title: The best chopper!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chopper! It was recommended to me by another online shopper with a cooking channel on Utube. I highly recommend it for all!

customer_reviews.text: They are not as sturdy as the ones we were replacing to use with students during garden lessons. Making salsa, pizza sauce, etc...

customer_reviews.title: Recommended

customer_reviews.text: Wonderful... actually use it more than my pampered chef chopper. Definitely recommend

customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing for chopping onions. I have had mine for a couple of years and i just got one for my mom.

customer_reviews.text: I brought this item 5 years ago and still using it. I wanted another one as backup

customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ONE AND USE IT ABOUT EVERY DAY. BOUGHT THIS ONE FOR A FRIENDS BIRTHDAY.

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: It is the best machine for cutting vegetables and other things

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand and it came pretty faster than expected.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product very sturdy and easy to clean and use..

customer_reviews.title: save so much time.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! so happy i ordered two more as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine E

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made not sure if it will hold up to what I'm using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE CHOPPER.
customer_reviews.text: This chopper is the best thing I have ever used. It cuts better than a blender and or other electric food processors and I didn't even have to use my electricity to make it work. I thought it was going to be something tough to use and yet surprised me when I only used 3 fingers to make a miracle for my Cowboy Caviar. I chopped Onions, peppers, garlic, tomatoes, celery and scallions and then noticed my wife was mad cause she wanted to use it. NOT JOKING. This is the best thing for a single person or a family. A MUST HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Like the Three Blade Feature
customer_reviews.text: This is my second machine; I have had one for probably 20 years plus and made lots of salsa. The handle broke off my first one but still can use it. The new machine with three blades chops finer than the old two bladed machine. The thing I like best about the new machine is the handle is higher and I don't hit and skin my knuckles when rotating the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I cook with a ton of veggies and have always chopped up every manually. This is so much faster!! The one thing my ex husband was right about. Lol It’s simple and easy to cut vegetables to the size you want it. As long as you don’t try to throw a whole onion in at once, it will work great and save time. For the price, it’s perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use. Appears sturdy but just got it so can’t say how well it will hold up. We use it mainly to chop onions and bell peppers. We buy in bulk and grow in summer. We chop and freeze in 1 and 2 cup bags for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Dede Silva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food processor/chopper
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for day to day use. I chop a lot of onions in this and it takes seconds to do it. Saves time and energy. Very easy to use. Doesn’t need a lot of hand pressure to use. I am worried that it might break easily so I carefully use it but I have absolutely no concerns until it actually happens.
customer_reviews.author: Zuhal

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for me to use. The handle won't stay on. I just hang on to it. Part of the problem may be i have arthritis in my hands so i can't blame it all on the machine. But the handle is useless.
customer_reviews.author: lori born

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: The original model of this chopper was terrific. This one is junk. The gears strip out every time it is used. The container split open. Don't buy it!

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this chopper , haven't used it much yet , but seems to work as advertised seems sturdy I'm not sure about the detachable handle but so far so good

customer_reviews.title: Handle falls off easily.  Cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: I the handle falls off easily so it’s very hard to hold on to the bowl while turning the knife to chop. Have to put my arm around the bowl. Very inconvenient. Would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used once to make pico de gallo. Felt like it was about to break into pieces while I was using it. It didn't, but it won't surprise me if it does on the 2nd use. I could be wrong. I'll update my review the next time I use it.

customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, sturdy and easy to clean. Far better than electric models that are far more expensive.

customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cutter from a long time from different manufacturers, but this one is very good quality, sharp and smooth.

customer_reviews.title: will help you keep all your fingers!!
customer_reviews.text: Last time I tried to make salsa with a traditional knife, I almost cut my thumb off... seven stiches later, I ordered this. All my fingers are intact and the salsa was great!!!

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs to have this product
customer_reviews.text: Where has this product been my whole life. It is an essential staple in my kitchen now. Saves me so much time and effort in prepping items for meals.

product_meta.title: Cambom Manual Vegetable Cutter Food Processor 8 in 1 - Chopper, Mixer, Blender, Whipper, Egg Separator, Mincer, Grinder, Dicer with Clear Container 1200ml BPA Free
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE: Not just a chopper, but also an egg separator, a dicer, a mincer, a mixer, a blender and so on. Perfect for chopping vegetables, nuts, herbs tomatoes for hummus, guacamole salsa and more.

PERFECT DESIGN: This manual hand crank food chopper contain 3 sharp blades cut all kinds of ingredients. a blending vanes mixes eggs, panada and so on, an egg separator can separate egg white and egg yellow completely.
SAFE & CONVENIENT: No noisy motor, no need for electricity, really hand operated. Portable and great for kitchens, RVS, camping and travel.

EASY TO USE AND CLEAN: Just Place the ingredients to the container, twist and lock the lid, and then crank the handle . Manual operation allows you to achieve the consistency you want. Clean up is easy, simply rinse with water after use and drip dry.
FOOD GRADE MATERIAL: 3 sharp blades are made from stainless steel, other parts are made from BPA free plastic. All the materials are food grade.
